00008 namespace PWAS.DataAccess.SQLRepositories
00009 {
00010     public class RolePermissionRepository : PWAS.DataAccess.Interfaces.IRolePermissionRepository
00011     {
00012         private Table<RolePermission> rolePermissionTable;
00013 
00014         public RolePermissionRepository(string connectionString)
00015         {
00016             rolePermissionTable = new PWASDataContext(connectionString).RolePermissions;
00017         }
00018 
00019         public void AddRolePermission(RolePermission rolePermission)
00020         {
00021             rolePermissionTable.InsertOnSubmit(rolePermission);
00022         }
00023 
00024         public RolePermission GetById(int rolePermissionId)
00025         {
00026             return rolePermissionTable.Single(rp => rp.permissionID == rolePermissionId);
00027         }
00028 
00029         public void DeleteRolePermission(int rolePermissionId)
00030         {
00031             rolePermissionTable.DeleteOnSubmit(GetById(rolePermissionId));
00032         }
00033 
00034         public void UpdateRolePermission(RolePermission newRolePermission)
00035         {
00036             RolePermission originalRolePermission = rolePermissionTable.Single(rp => rp.permissionID == newRolePermission.permissionID);
00037             rolePermissionTable.Attach(newRolePermission, originalRolePermission);
00038         }
00039 
00040         public void SubmitChanges()
00041         {
00042             rolePermissionTable.Context.SubmitChanges();
00043         }
00044 
00045         public IQueryable<RolePermission> RolePermissions
00046         {
00047             get { return rolePermissionTable; }
00048         }
00049     }
00050 }
